flawed_nl_solution:
The difference in age between Teresa and Morio is 71 - 59 = <<71-59=12>>12 years.
When their daughter is born, Teresa is 38 - 12 = <<38-12=62>>62 years old.
#### 62

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 26, not 62. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
